Dear Cantera developers,

I want to run Cantera on a machine without an ins=
talled Python 
interpreter. Browsing source files I found a conversion prog=
ram, which 
is called ck2ctml. At first glance it looks that this program w=
ill 
convert the chemkin file in the intermediate cantera file without 
inv=
oking a python parser. Is it correct? 

Best regards, 
Anatoli Mokhov
